STEREOPHONIC TRANSMISSIONS
The Working Party viewed the possibility of repeat transmissions
in stereo with some anxiety, in view of the delicate situation in which
producing organizations would be placed at the contractual stage.
It recommends that any subscribing station wishing to broadcast a stereoÂ¬
phonic repeat should make its own contractual arrangements with the
artists after the EBU contract has been signed.
The Working Party hoped that subscribers would continue to be
patient for another year or two, in view of the possibility of international
stereo distribution then becoming available by circuit.
